name: Sanic R
description:
REQUIREMENTS:

This is an in-browser unity game I threw together in 2013. And Unity doesn't even host it through the /web-player/ link anymore, so here's two items you need to download:

Unity Web Player 3.x - hosted by unity

Firefox 52.0 ESR -- 32 bit version for windows

or

Firefox - just look through here for the mac or linux version or whatever

AND DON'T LET FIREFOX UPDATE or else it will not work
